settings.question: What is your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on all products. Items must be in original condition with all accessories included.

settings.question: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. Free shipping on orders over $100.

settings.question: What warranty do your products have?
settings.answer: All our products come with a 2-year manufacturer warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship.

settings.question: How do I set up my camera system?
settings.answer: Each product comes with detailed instructions and our mobile app guides you through the setup process. Our support team is available 24/7 if you need assistance.
